title: Financial Analyst Job at Yoh (Ridgefield, CT)
text:
Financial Analyst needed for a contract opportunity with Yoh's client located in Ridgefield, Connecticut. 
The Big Picture - Top Skills You Should Possess: - Financial analysis - Advanced Excel and PowerPoint 
What You'll Be Doing: - Assist in the accurate and timely preparation and submission budgets and long term forecasts including expenses, headcount and capital. - Prepare presentations and adhoc analyses as required. - Assist in the month end/quarterly closes including accruals, analyses, report preparation and distribution, quarterly government and headquarters reporting. - Timely and accurate month end close responsibilities including posting journal entries for accruals and any necessary adjustments, account analysis, preparation of month end reports and distribution to business partners. - Provide day to day financial support to the HR, Global Sourcing, Public Affairs and Communications, Govt. Policy and Administration areas. - Assist in preparation of the Long Term Forecasting process. Participate in meeting if required, maintain Excel files. Upload data into planning systems ensuring accuracy and timely completion 
What You Need to Bring to the Table: - Bachelor's Degree in Finance or Accounting - Five (5) or more years experience - Strong analytical skills - Advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills - SAP/BW experience a plus - Ability to manage multiple tasks and work under tight deadlines and pressure 
Opportunity is Calling, Apply Now! 
Yoh, a Day & Zimmermann company, is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V. 
J2W: PROF
